compact.css: .grid-container { grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr)); gap: 1rem; } .card-content { padding: 1rem; } .card-image, .card-icon { height: 150px; }

masonry.css: .grid-container { display: block; column-count: 3; column-gap: 2rem; } .card { break-inside: avoid; margin-bottom: 2rem; } @media (max-width: 768px) { .grid-container { column-count: 2; } } @media (max-width: 480px) { .grid-container { column-count: 1; } }

horizontal.css: .horizontal-card { flex-direction: row; } .horizontal-card .card-header { flex: 0 0 200px; } .horizontal-card .card-image { height: 100%; } @media (max-width: 768px) { .horizontal-card { flex-direction: column; } .horizontal-card .card-header { flex: none; } }
